description: Mobile techniques used by DEFENSOR ID, ATT&CK software S0479 v1.0
name: DEFENSOR ID (S0479)

techniques.comment: [DEFENSOR ID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0479) has used Firebase Cloud Messaging for C2.(Citation: ESET DEFENSOR ID)

[DEFENSOR ID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0479) abuses the accessibility service to auto-start the malware on device boot. This is accomplished by receiving the `android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService` intent.(Citation: ESET DEFENSOR ID)

[DEFENSOR ID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0479) can abuse the accessibility service to perform actions on behalf of the user, including launching attacker-specified applications to steal data.(Citation: ESET DEFENSOR ID)
[DEFENSOR ID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0479) can abuse the accessibility service to read any text displayed on the screen.(Citation: ESET DEFENSOR ID)
[DEFENSOR ID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0479) can retrieve a list of installed applications.(Citation: ESET DEFENSOR ID)
